languages.text: The Magus marks a zone on the battlefield. In the next {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, an explosion occurs, dealing <u>(from 25 to 70)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with 30% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} to all units in that zone.

traits.locale_text: The Magus marks a zone on the battlefield. In the next {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, an explosion happens there dealing <u>(from 25 to 70)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with 30% armour penetration to all units in that zone.

The Magus marks a zone on the battlefield. In the next {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, an explosion happens there dealing <u>(from 25 to 70)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with 30% armour penetration to all units in that zone.

The Magus marks a zone on the battlefield. In the next {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, an explosion occurs, dealing <u>(from 25 to 70)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with 30% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} to all units in that zone.

languages.text: The Magus marks a zone on the battlefield that will explode in this zone in 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: The Magus marks a zone on the battlefield that will explode in this zone in 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

languages.text: Магус размечает зону на поле боя. В следующем {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунде{/g} в ней произойдет взрыв, наносящий всем находящимся там существам <u>(от 25 до 70)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} с {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитием брони{/g} 30%.
languages.original_text: The Magus marks a zone on the battlefield. In the next {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, an explosion occurs, dealing <u>(from 25 to 70)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with 30% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} to all units in that zone.

traits.locale_text: Магус размечает зону на поле боя. В следующем {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунде{/g} в ней произойдет взрыв, наносящий всем находящимся там существам <u>(от 25 до 70)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} с {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитием брони{/g} 30%.

Магус размечает зону на поле боя. В следующем {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунде{/g} в ней произойдет взрыв, наносящий всем находящимся там существам <u>(от 25 до 70)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} с {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитием брони{/g} 30%.

languages.text: El magus designa una zona en el campo de batalla. En el siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g} se produce una explosión que inflige <u>(de 25 a 70)</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} con un 30 % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g} a todas las unidades que se encuentren en esa zona.
languages.original_text: The Magus marks a zone on the battlefield. In the next {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, an explosion occurs, dealing <u>(from 25 to 70)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with 30% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} to all units in that zone.

traits.locale_text: El magus designa una zona en el campo de batalla. En el siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g} se produce una explosión que inflige <u>(de 25 a 70)</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} con un 30 % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g} a todas las unidades que se encuentren en esa zona.

languages.text: メイガスは戦場にゾーンを示す。次の{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}に爆発が起こり、そのゾーンにいるすべてのユニットに<u>(25～70)</u>{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージを{/g}与え、30%の{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}装甲貫通{/g}を与える。
languages.original_text: The Magus marks a zone on the battlefield. In the next {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, an explosion occurs, dealing <u>(from 25 to 70)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with 30% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} to all units in that zone.

traits.locale_text: メイガスは戦場にゾーンを示す。次の{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}に爆発が起こり、そのゾーンにいるすべてのユニットに<u>(25～70)</u>{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージを{/g}与え、30%の{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}装甲貫通{/g}を与える。

languages.text: 教团教主在战场上标记一片区域。下一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}开始时，被标记的区域会发生爆炸，对区域内所有单位造成<u>25-70</u>点{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。此次攻击拥有30%{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}。
languages.original_text: The Magus marks a zone on the battlefield. In the next {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, an explosion occurs, dealing <u>(from 25 to 70)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with 30% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} to all units in that zone.

traits.locale_text: 教团教主在战场上标记一片区域。下一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}开始时，被标记的区域会发生爆炸，对区域内所有单位造成<u>25-70</u>点{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。此次攻击拥有30%{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}。

languages.text: Der Magus markiert auf dem Schlachtfeld eine Zone. In der nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} fügt eine Explosion allen Einheiten in dieser Zone <u>(25 bis 70)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} mit 30 % {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g} zu.
languages.original_text: The Magus marks a zone on the battlefield. traits.locale_text: Der Magus markiert auf dem Schlachtfeld eine Zone. In der nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} fügt eine Explosion allen Einheiten in dieser Zone <u>(25 bis 70)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} mit 30 % {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g} zu.

languages.text: Le Magus marque une zone sur le champ de bataille. Lors du prochain {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, une explosion se déclenche et inflige <u>(de 25 à 70)</u> points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} avec 30 % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g} à toutes les unités dans sa zone d'effet.

Le Magus marque une zone sur le champ de bataille. languages.text: Magus, çatışma alanında bir bölgeyi işaretler. Bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntta{/g} bir patlama meydana gelerek o bölgedeki tüm birimlere %30 {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}zırh delme{/g} değerine sahip <u>(25 ila 70)</u> puan {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verir.
